code: export var barFactoryOptions=function barFactoryOptions(){var barXAxisData=[];var barData1=[];var barData2=[];for(var i=0;i<100;i++){barXAxisData.push('Prod. '+i);barData1.push((Math.sin(i/5)*(i/5-10)+i/6)*5);barData2.push((Math.cos(i/5)*(i/5-10)+i/6)*5);}return{color:['#e9e165','#ed5564'],legend:{data:['USA','UK'],align:'left'},tooltip:{},grid:{left:0,right:0,bottom:0,containLabel:true},xAxis:{data:barXAxisData,silent:false,splitLine:{show:false}},yAxis:{},series:[{name:'USA',type:'bar',data:barData1,animationDelay:function animationDelay(idx){return idx*10;}},{name:'UK',type:'bar',data:barData2,animationDelay:function animationDelay(idx){return idx*10+100;}}],animationEasing:'elasticOut',animationDelayUpdate:function animationDelayUpdate(idx){return idx*5;}};};
